name: Perilous Persons and the Dungeon of Ancient Things
name_original: Perilous Persons and the Dungeon of Ancient Things
description:
Fixed version: https://jellycheesecake.itch.io/perilous-persons-and-the-dungeon-of-ancient-thin...

Controls:

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

E - Open currently collected item

Hold Ctrl and press "F" for fullscreen.

Esc to exit fullscreen.

To select a character, click one.

* Once you have collected all items, that is the end of the game,  so far...

In this game a group of people have decided to search for the ancient things supposedly in this mysterious dungeon, but can they even reach them?
